data.comment: The first-half is under way at AFAS Stadion - Cercle Brugge kick-off to start the match.
At AFAS Stadion, Johanna Omolo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 37, William Togui scores to make it 1-0 at AFAS Stadion.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Mechelen with the kick-off.
In the minute 54, Goal! Ike Ugbo (Cercle Brugge) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Dino Hotic puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
The home team have replaced Geoffry Hairemans with Igor De Camargo. This is the first substitution made today by Wouter Vrancken.
In the minute 63, Onur Kaya is replacing Nikola Storm for the home team.
Goal! Aster Vranckx equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Thibo Somers is replacing Ike Ugbo for Cercle Brugge at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 72, Aster Vranckx (Mechelen) has received a first yellow card.
Paul Clement (Cercle Brugge) is making a second substitution, with Alimani Gory replacing Kylian Hazard.
Jeremy Taravel for Cercle Brugge has been booked by Kevin Van Damme and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 80, Cercle Brugge take a 2-3 lead thanks to Thibo Somers.
Mechelen's Igor De Camargo has been booked in Mechelen.
Jordi Vanlerberghe is on a sub for Rocky Bushiri for Mechelen.
In the minute 88, Onur Kaya (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team replace Dimitar Velkovski with Alexander Corryn.
